column1: Uchi////Underwhelming. I came here with two friends for dinner and drinks
column2: and the entire experience was hit and miss. First we sat outside and waited for a table in their lovely patio area
column3: where we were able to order drinks and appetizers. Uchi has an impressive imported Japanese beer and wine selection
column4: and some fantastic starters-I highly recommend the edamame and fried hanna (cauliflower) and Kabocha.
